medium: Cotton, silk; plain weave and embroidery
title: Woman's skirt (Corte)
description: Two-panel length joined at the ends to form a tube; randas in yellow, purple and brown cover seams; ground cloth is indigo with narrow, 2-thread yellow stripes arranged at 1/3\" intervals; gathered at top, hemmed at lower edge.
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
